table.name: vtiger_hrm_salaryreference
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hrm_salaryreference`( `id` int(19) NOT NULL, `employ_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `current_salary` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `before_increase_date` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `salary_after` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `reviewer` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `hr_salary_action` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `note` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `review_date` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
